targets.query: SELECT count("duration_ms") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/)
SELECT sum("duration_ms") /1000 FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/)
SELECT sum("duration_ms") /1000/60 FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("duration_ms") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("duration_ms") /1000 FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("tempo") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("danceability") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("energy") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("instrumentalness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("acousticness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("speechiness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("liveness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("valence") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT mean("danceability") AS "avg danceability", mean("energy") AS "avg energy", mean("instrumentalness") AS "avg instrumentalness", mean("acousticness") AS "avg acousticness", mean("speechiness") AS "avg speechiness", mean("liveness") AS "avg liveness", mean("valence") AS "avg valence" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "tempo" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("value") FROM "genre_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "genre", time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT sum("duration_ms")  / 1000 / 60 AS "minutes" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "artists"
SELECT "duration_ms","track","artists" FROM "track_history" WHERE "track" != '' AND ( "user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT "user","service","artists","track","duration_ms" / 1000 as "seconds" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1000

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "user" WHERE "user" =~ /^${__user.login}$/
list.label: User
list.name: user
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "user" WHERE "user" =~ /^${__user.login}$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "service" WHERE "user" =~ /^${__user.login}$/
list.label: Service
list.name: service
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "service" WHERE "user" =~ /^${__user.login}$/

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("artists") FROM (SELECT "artists","duration_ms" FROM "track_history" WHERE "user" =~ /^$user$/ AND $timeFilter)
list.label: Artist
list.name: artist
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("artists") FROM (SELECT "artists","duration_ms" FROM "track_history" WHERE "user" =~ /^$user$/ AND $timeFilter)
